en.bdb: Vaar 22
One Oankar,the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
The formless Lord who is without any anchor and is imperceptible, has not made himself fully known to anyone.
From unembodiment He assumed the form by himself and becoming Oankar
He created infinite wondrous forms.
In the form of the true name (ndm) and becoming the creator, He came to be known as the protector of His own reputation.
Through three dimensional maya He nourishes one and all.
He is the creator of the cosmos and prescribes its destiny.

verse.gurmukhi: sBsY dy AwDwru n qoil qulwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਭਸੈ ਦੇ ਆਧਾਰੁ ਨ ਤੋਲਿ ਤੁਲਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: He is the basis of all, the incomparable One.

transliteration.english: sabhasai dhe aadhaar na tol tulaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: सभसै दे आधारु न तोलि तुलाइआ।
transliteration.en: sabhasai dhe aadhaar na tol tulaiaa|
transliteration.hi: सभसै दे आधारु न तोलि तुलाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: səɓəsæ d̪e əɑt̪ɑr nə t̪ɔl t̪ʊlɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: سبھسَے دے آدھار ن تول تُلاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: iliKAw iQiq n vwru n mwhu jxwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਲਿਖਿਆ ਥਿਤਿ ਨ ਵਾਰੁ ਨ ਮਾਹੁ ਜਣਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: None has ever disclosed the date, the day and month (of creation).

transliteration.english: likhiaa thit na vaar na maahu janaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: लिखिआ थिति न वारु न माहु जणाइआ।
transliteration.en: likhiaa thit na vaar na maahu janaiaa|
transliteration.hi: लिखिआ थिति न वारु न माहु जणाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: lɪkʰɪəɑ t̪ʰɪt̪ nə ʋɑr nə mɑh d͡ʒəɳɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: لِکھآ تھت ن وار ن ماهُ جݨاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: vyd kqyb vIcwr n AwiK suxwieAw ]1]
verse.unicode: ਵੇਦ ਕਤੇਬ ਵੀਚਾਰ ਨ ਆਖਿ ਸੁਣਾਇਆ ॥੧॥

en.bdb: Even the Vedas and other scriptures could not fully explain His thoughts.

transliteration.english: vedh kateb veechaar na aakh sunaiaa ||1||
transliteration.hindi: वेद कतेब वीचार न आखि सुणाइआ ॥१॥
transliteration.en: vedh kateb veechaar na aakh sunaiaa ||1||
transliteration.hi: वेद कतेब वीचार न आखि सुणाइआ ॥१॥
transliteration.ipa: ʋed̪ kət̪eb ʋit͡ʃɑr nə əɑkʰ sʊɳɑɪɑ.1.
transliteration.ur: وےد کتےب ویِچار ن آکھ سُݨاایا ۔۔۱۔۔

en.bdb: Divine Power
Who without any props, and uncontrolled by habit has created behavioural patterns?
How the swan reaches the heights of sky?
Wondrous is the mystery of wings which made the swan to soar at such heights.

verse.gurmukhi: DR¨ ciVAw Asmwix n tl tlwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਧ੍ਰੂ ਚੜਿਆ ਅਸਮਾਣਿ ਨ ਟਲ ਟਲਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: How did Dhruv in the form of immovable star mount the sky?

transliteration.english: dhraoo chaRiaa asamaan na Tal Talaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: ध्रू चड़िआ असमाणि न टल टलाइआ।
transliteration.en: dhraoo chaRiaa asamaan na Tal Talaiaa|
transliteration.hi: ध्रू चड़िआ असमाणि न टल टलाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ə̀ɹəu t͡ʃəɽɪəɑ əsəmɑɳ nə ʈəl ʈəlɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: دھر¨ چڑآ اسماݨ ن ٹل ٹلاایا۔

en.bdb: It is a mystery how a humble eschewing ego acquires honour in life.
Only the gurmukh who has meditated upon Lord is accepted in His court.
Divine Power

verse.gurmukhi: EVku EVku Bwil n EVku pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਓੜਕੁ ਓੜਕੁ ਭਾਲਿ ਨ ਓੜਕੁ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: In order to know Him, people put in extreme efforts but could not know His extant.

transliteration.english: oRak oRak bhaal na oRak paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: ओड़कु ओड़कु भालि न ओड़कु पाइआ।
transliteration.en: oRak oRak bhaal na oRak paiaa|
transliteration.hi: ओड़कु ओड़कु भालि न ओड़कु पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: oəɽək oəɽək ɓɑl nə oəɽək pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: اوڑک اوڑک بھال ن اوڑک پاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: EVk Bwlix gey is Pyr n AwieAw]
verse.unicode: ਓੜਕ ਭਾਲਣਿ ਗਏ ਸਿ ਫੇਰ ਨ ਆਇਆ॥

en.bdb: Those who went out to know His bounds could never return.

transliteration.english: oRak bhaalan ge s fer na aaiaa||
transliteration.hindi: ओड़क भालणि गए सि फेर न आइआ॥
transliteration.en: oRak bhaalan ge s fer na aaiaa||
transliteration.hi: ओड़क भालणि गए सि फेर न आइआ॥
transliteration.ipa: oəɽək ɓɑləɳ Gee s fer nə əɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: اوڑک بھالݨ گاے س پھےر ن آایا۔۔

en.bdb: To know Him, myriads of people have remained wandering in illusions.

verse.gurmukhi: Awdu vfw ivsmwdu n AMqu suxwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਆਦੁ ਵਡਾ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ ਨ ਅੰਤੁ ਸੁਣਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: That primeval Lord is the grand wonder whose mystery cannot be understood by mere listening.

transliteration.english: aadh vaddaa visamaadh na a(n)t sunaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: आदु वडा विसमादु न अंतु सुणाइआ।
transliteration.en: aadh vaddaa visamaadh na a(n)t sunaiaa|
transliteration.hi: आदु वडा विसमादु न अंतु सुणाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: əɑd̪ ʋəɖɑ ʋɪsəmɑd̪ nə əŋt̪ sʊɳɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: آد وڈا وسماد ن اںت سُݨاایا۔

en.bdb: His waves, shades etc are limitless.

verse.gurmukhi: ieku kvwau pswau n AlKu lKwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਇਕੁ ਕਵਾਉ ਪਸਾਉ ਨ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The imperceptible Lord who has created all through His single vibration cannot be perceived.

transliteration.english: eik kavaau pasaau na alakh lakhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: इकु कवाउ पसाउ न अलखु लखाइआ।
transliteration.en: eik kavaau pasaau na alakh lakhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: इकु कवाउ पसाउ न अलखु लखाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: eɪk kəʋɑo pəsɑo nə ələkʰ ləkʰɑɪɑ.

en.bdb: I am sacrifice unto that creator, whose maya is this creation.
The Guru has made me understand that God alone knows about His own self (none else can know Him).
The Creation
The true Creator as the Truth is pervading one and all.

verse.gurmukhi: schu paux aupwie Git Git CwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਚਹੁ ਪਉਣ ਉਪਾਇ ਘਟਿ ਘਟਿ ਛਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Out of Truth He created air and (in the form of vital air) is residing in all

transliteration.english: sachahu paun upai ghaT ghaT chhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: सचहु पउण उपाइ घटि घटि छाइआ।
transliteration.en: sachahu paun upai ghaT ghaT chhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: सचहु पउण उपाइ घटि घटि छाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: sət͡ʃəh poʊɳ oʊpɑeɪ Gʰəʈ Gʰəʈ ɕɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: سچهُ پاݨ اُپاا گھٹ گھٹِ چھاایا۔

en.bdb: From air was created water which always remains humble i.e. it. always moves down wards.
Earth as a raft is made to float on water.
From water emerged fire which spread throughout the whole vegetation.
By virtue of this very fire (heat) the trees became. full of fruits
In this way, air, water and fire were integrated under the order of that primaeval Lord
And thus was this game of creation arranged.
Creation
Flow great is the'truth that it is liked by that true One (God).
How vast is the air that moves in all the four directions.
Fragrance is placed in sandal which makes other trees also fragrant.

verse.gurmukhi: Kih Kih vMsu gvwie vWsu jlwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਖਹਿ ਖਹਿ ਵੰਸੁ ਗਵਾਇ ਵਾਂਸੁ ਜਲਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Bamboos burn by their own friction and destroy their own abode.

transliteration.english: kheh kheh va(n)s gavai vaa(n)s jalaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: खहि खहि वंसु गवाइ वाँसु जलाइआ।
transliteration.en: kheh kheh va(n)s gavai vaa(n)s jalaiaa|
transliteration.hi: खहि खहि वंसु गवाइ वाँसु जलाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: kʰəh kʰəh ʋəŋs Gəʋɑeɪ ʋɑⁿəs d͡ʒəlɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: کھهِ کھهِ وںس گواا واںس جلاایا۔

en.bdb: The forms of the bodies have become visible y the association of Siva and Sakti.
One distinguishes between the cuckoo and the crow by listening to their voice.
He created the four life-mines and endowed them worthy speech and judiciously gifted breaths.
He made the A's accept the five gross varieties of the (subtle) unstuck Word and thus on the beat of drum He pronounced His supremacy over all.
Qualities of a sadhu
Music, melody, dialogue and knowledge make man a conscious being.
By disciplining the nine gates of the body one is called a sadhu.

verse.gurmukhi: vIh iekIh aulMiG inj Gir AwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਵੀਹ ਇਕੀਹ ਉਲੰਘਿ ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਆਇਆ।

en.bdb: Transcending the worldy illusions he stabilizes within his self.

transliteration.english: veeh ikeeh ula(n)gh nij ghar aaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: वीह इकीह उलंघि निज घरि आइआ।
transliteration.en: veeh ikeeh ula(n)gh nij ghar aaiaa|
transliteration.hi: वीह इकीह उलंघि निज घरि आइआ।
transliteration.ipa: ʋih eɪkih oʊləŋGʰə̀ nɪd͡ʒ Gʰər əɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: ویِه اکیِه اُلںگھ نج گھر آایا۔

en.bdb: Prior to this, he was running after various practices of hath yoga,
Such as the rechak, purak, kumbhak, tratak, nyolrand bhujarig asan.
He practised different processes of breathing like ire', pirigala and susumna.
He perfected their khechari and chachari postures.
Through such mysterious sport he establishes himself in the equipoise.
Yoga

verse.gurmukhi: qRYsqu AMgul lY mnu pvxu imlwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਤ੍ਰੈਸਤੁ ਅੰਗੁਲ ਲੈ ਮਨੁ ਪਵਣੁ ਮਿਲਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The breath going ten fingers out the mind is associated with the vital air the practice is completed.

transliteration.english: traisat a(n)gul lai man pavan milaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: त्रैसतु अंगुल लै मनु पवणु मिलाइआ।
transliteration.en: traisat a(n)gul lai man pavan milaiaa|
transliteration.hi: त्रैसतु अंगुल लै मनु पवणु मिलाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɹæsət̪ əŋGʊl læ mən pəʋəɳ mɪlɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: ترَےست اںگل لَے من پوݨ ملاایا۔

en.bdb: The imperceptible soham (I am He) is ualised in equipoise.
In this state of equipoise, the rare drink of ever-wing cascade is quaffed.

verse.gurmukhi: Anhd Duin ilv lwie nwd vjwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਅਨਹਦ ਧੁਨਿ ਲਿਵ ਲਾਇ ਨਾਦ ਵਜਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Getting absorbed in the unstruck melody a mysterious sound is heard.

transliteration.english: anahadh dhun liv lai naadh vajaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: अनहद धुनि लिव लाइ नाद वजाइआ।
transliteration.en: anahadh dhun liv lai naadh vajaiaa|
transliteration.hi: अनहद धुनि लिव लाइ नाद वजाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: ənəhəd̪ t̪ʊn lɪʋ lɑeɪ nɑd̪ ʋəd͡ʒɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: انهد دھُن لو لاا ناد وجاایا۔

en.bdb: Through silent prayer, one merges in the Suny (Lord)
And in that perfect mental tranquillity egoism is done away with.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK iprm cKwie inj Gru CwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਿਰਮ ਚਖਾਇ ਨਿਜ ਘਰੁ ਛਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The gurmukhs drink from the cup of love and establish themselves in their own real self.

transliteration.english: gurmukh piram chakhai nij ghar chhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि पिरम चखाइ निज घरु छाइआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh piram chakhai nij ghar chhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि पिरम चखाइ निज घरु छाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ pɪrəm t͡ʃəkʰɑeɪ nɪd͡ʒ Gʰər ɕɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ پرم چکھاا نج گھر چھاایا۔

en.bdb: Meeting the Guru, the Sikh achieves the perfect completeness.
The Guru and the Sikh
As the lamp is lit from the flame of another lamp;
As sandal's fragrance makes the whole vegetation fragrant
As the water mixing with water acquires the status of trivevi(the confluence of three rivers - Gatiga; Yamuna and Sarasvati);
As air after meeting the vital air becomes unstruck melody;
As a diamond being perforated by another diamond gets stringed into a necklace;
A stone by becoming the philosopher's stone performs its feat and

verse.gurmukhi: Anl pMK puqu hoie ipqw smHwilAw[
verse.unicode: ਅਨਲ ਪੰਖ ਪੁਤੁ ਹੋਇ ਪਿਤਾ ਸਮ੍ਹਾਲਿਆ।

en.bdb: As an anil bird getting birth in the sky promotes the work of its father;

transliteration.english: anal pa(n)kh put hoi pitaa samhaaliaa|
transliteration.hindi: अनल पंख पुतु होइ पिता सम्हालिआ।
transliteration.en: anal pa(n)kh put hoi pitaa samhaaliaa|
transliteration.hi: अनल पंख पुतु होइ पिता सम्हालिआ।
transliteration.ipa: ənəl pəŋkʰ pʊt̪ hɔeɪ pɪt̪ɑ səmʰɑlɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: انل پںکھ پُت هوا پتا سمھالآ۔

en.bdb: Likewise the Guru making the Sikh meet the Lord establishes him in the equipoise.
Praises of the Lord
How great is His one vibration which has created the whole expanse of the world!
How big is His weighing hook that it has sustained the whole creation!
Creating crores of universes He has spread around His power of speech.

verse.gurmukhi: lK lK Driq Agwis ADr DrwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਲਖ ਧਰਤਿ ਅਗਾਸਿ ਅਧਰ ਧਰਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Lakhs of earths and skies He kept hanging without support.

transliteration.english: lakh lakh dharat agaas adhar dharaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: लख लख धरति अगासि अधर धराइआ।
transliteration.en: lakh lakh dharat agaas adhar dharaiaa|
transliteration.hi: लख लख धरति अगासि अधर धराइआ।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ ləkʰ t̪ərət̪ əGɑs ət̪ər t̪ərɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: لکھ لکھ دھرت اگاس ادھر دھراایا۔

en.bdb: Million types of airs, waters and fires He created.
He created the game of eighty four lakhs of species.

verse.gurmukhi: join join jIA jMq AMq n pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਜੋਨਿ ਜੋਨਿ ਜੀਅ ਜੰਤ ਅੰਤ ਨ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: No end is known of the creatures of even one species.

transliteration.english: jon jon jeea ja(n)t a(n)t na paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: जोनि जोनि जीअ जंत अंत न पाइआ।
transliteration.en: jon jon jeea ja(n)t a(n)t na paiaa|
transliteration.hi: जोनि जोनि जीअ जंत अंत न पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: d͡ʒɔn d͡ʒɔn d͡ʒiə d͡ʒəŋt̪ əŋt̪ nə pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: جون جون جیِا جںت اںت ن پاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: isir isir lyKu ilKwie AlyKu iDAwieAw ]9]
verse.unicode: ਸਿਰਿ ਸਿਰਿ ਲੇਖੁ ਲਿਖਾਇ ਅਲੇਖੁ ਧਿਆਇਆ ॥੯॥

en.bdb: He has engraved writ on the forehead of all so that they all meditate upon the Lord who is beyond writ.

transliteration.english: sir sir lekh likhai alekh dhiaaiaa ||9||
transliteration.hindi: सिरि सिरि लेखु लिखाइ अलेखु धिआइआ ॥९॥
transliteration.en: sir sir lekh likhai alekh dhiaaiaa ||9||
transliteration.hi: सिरि सिरि लेखु लिखाइ अलेखु धिआइआ ॥९॥
transliteration.ipa: sɪr sɪr lekʰ lɪkʰɑeɪ əlekʰ t̪ɪəɑɪɑ.9.
transliteration.ur: سِر سر لےکھ لکھاا الےکھ دھآایا ۔۔۹۔۔

en.bdb: The way of Gurmukhs
The true Guru has recited (to the disciples) the true name.

verse.gurmukhi: gur mUriq scu Qwau iDAwnu DrwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਸਚੁ ਥਾਉ ਧਿਆਨੁ ਧਰਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Gurmurati,the word of the Guru is the real object to meditate upon.

transliteration.english: gur moorat sach thaau dhiaan dharaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर मूरति सचु थाउ धिआनु धराइआ।
transliteration.en: gur moorat sach thaau dhiaan dharaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर मूरति सचु थाउ धिआनु धराइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr murət̪ sət͡ʃ t̪ʰɑo t̪ɪəɑn t̪ərɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر مُورت سچ تھاا دھآن دھراایا۔

en.bdb: The holy congregation is such a refuge where the truth adorns the place.
In the court of the true justice, the order of the Lord prevails.
The village (abode) of the Gurmukhs is the truth which has been habitated with the Word (Sabad).
The ego is decimated there and the (pleasure giving) shade of humility is obtained there.
Through the wisdom of Guru (Gurmati) the unbearable truth is instilled into the heart.

verse.gurmukhi: iqsu bilhwrY jwau su Bwxw BwieAw ]10]
verse.unicode: ਤਿਸੁ ਬਲਿਹਾਰੈ ਜਾਉ ਸੁ ਭਾਣਾ ਭਾਇਆ ॥੧੦॥

en.bdb: I am sacrifice unto him who loves the Will of the Lord.

transliteration.english: tis balihaarai jaau su bhaanaa bhaiaa ||10||
transliteration.hindi: तिसु बलिहारै जाउ सु भाणा भाइआ ॥१०॥
transliteration.en: tis balihaarai jaau su bhaanaa bhaiaa ||10||
transliteration.hi: तिसु बलिहारै जाउ सु भाणा भाइआ ॥१०॥
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɪs bəlɪhɑræ d͡ʒɑo s ɓɑɳɑ ɓɑɪɑ.1ə0.
transliteration.ur: تِس بلهارَے جاا سُ بھاݨا بھاایا ۔۔۱۰۔۔

en.bdb: Gurmukh, the supreme stage
Gurmukhs accept the will of that Lord as truth and they love His will.
Bowing at the feet of the true Guru, they shed their sense of ego.
As disciples, they please the Guru and the heart of the Gum becomes happy.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK shij suBwie n AlK lKwvxw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਹਜਿ ਸੁਭਾਇ ਨ ਅਲਖ ਲਖਾਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: The gurmukh realises the imperceptible Lord spontaneously.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sahaj subhai na alakh lakhaavanaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सहजि सुभाइ न अलख लखावणा।
transliteration.en: gurmukh sahaj subhai na alakh lakhaavanaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सहजि सुभाइ न अलख लखावणा।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ səhəd͡ʒ sʊɓɑeɪ nə ələkʰ ləkʰɑʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سهج سُبھاا ن الکھ لکھاوݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurisK iql n qmwie kwr kmwvxw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਤਿਲ ਨ ਤਮਾਇ ਕਾਰ ਕਮਾਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: The Sikh of Guru has no greed at all and he earns his livelihood by the labour of his hands.

transliteration.english: gursikh til na tamai kaar kamaavanaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरसिख तिल न तमाइ कार कमावणा।
transliteration.en: gursikh til na tamai kaar kamaavanaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरसिख तिल न तमाइ कार कमावणा।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəsɪkʰ t̪ɪl nə t̪əmɑeɪ kɑr kəmɑʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرسکھ تل ن تماا کار کماوݨا۔

en.bdb: Merging his consciousness into the word he obeys the commands of the Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: vIh iekIh lMGwie inj Gir jwvxw[
verse.unicode: ਵੀਹ ਇਕੀਹ ਲੰਘਾਇ ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਜਾਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Crossing beyond the worldly illusions he abides in his own real self.

transliteration.english: veeh ikeeh la(n)ghai nij ghar jaavanaa|
transliteration.hindi: वीह इकीह लंघाइ निज घरि जावणा।
transliteration.en: veeh ikeeh la(n)ghai nij ghar jaavanaa|
transliteration.hi: वीह इकीह लंघाइ निज घरि जावणा।
transliteration.ipa: ʋih eɪkih ləŋGʰɑeɪ nɪd͡ʒ Gʰər d͡ʒɑʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: ویِه اکیِه لںگھاا نج گھر جاوݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl pwie shij smwvxw ]11]
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲ ਪਾਇ ਸਹਜਿ ਸਮਾਵਣਾ ॥੧੧॥

en.bdb: This way, the gurmukhs having attained the pleasure fruit absorb themselves in equipoise.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sukh fal pai sahaj samaavanaa ||11||
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सुख फल पाइ सहजि समावणा ॥११॥
transliteration.en: gurmukh sukh fal pai sahaj samaavanaa ||11||
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सुख फल पाइ सहजि समावणा ॥११॥
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ sʊkʰ fəl pɑeɪ səhəd͡ʒ səmɑʋəɳɑ.1ə1.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سُکھ پھل پاا سهج سماوݨا ۔۔۱۱۔۔

en.bdb: Guru Angad Dev

verse.gurmukhi: ieku gurU ieku isKu gurmuiK jwixAw[
verse.unicode: ਇਕੁ ਗੁਰੂ ਇਕੁ ਸਿਖੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਜਾਣਿਆ।

en.bdb: Gurmukhs knew very well about the one Guru (Nanak) and one disciple (Guru Angad).

transliteration.english: eik guroo ik sikh gurmukh jaaniaa|
transliteration.hindi: इकु गुरू इकु सिखु गुरमुखि जाणिआ।
transliteration.en: eik guroo ik sikh gurmukh jaaniaa|
transliteration.hi: इकु गुरू इकु सिखु गुरमुखि जाणिआ।
transliteration.ipa: eɪk Gʊru eɪk sɪkʰ Gʊrəmʊkʰ d͡ʒɑɳɪəɑ.

verse.gurmukhi: gur cylw gur isKu sic smwixAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲਾ ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖੁ ਸਚਿ ਸਮਾਣਿਆ।

en.bdb: By becoming the true Sikh of the Guru, this disciple virtually merged himself into the latter.

transliteration.english: gur chelaa gur sikh sach samaaniaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर चेला गुर सिखु सचि समाणिआ।
transliteration.en: gur chelaa gur sikh sach samaaniaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर चेला गुर सिखु सचि समाणिआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr t͡ʃelɑ Gʊr sɪkʰ sət͡ʃ səmɑɳɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر چےلا گُر سکھ سچ سماݨآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: so siqgur so isKu sbdu vKwixAw[
verse.unicode: ਸੋ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸੋ ਸਿਖੁ ਸਬਦੁ ਵਖਾਣਿਆ।

en.bdb: The true Guru and the disciple were identical (in spirit) and their Word was also one.

transliteration.english: so satigur so sikh sabadh vakhaaniaa|
transliteration.hindi: सो सतिगुर सो सिखु सबदु वखाणिआ।
transliteration.en: so satigur so sikh sabadh vakhaaniaa|
transliteration.hi: सो सतिगुर सो सिखु सबदु वखाणिआ।
transliteration.ipa: sɔ sət̪ɪGʊr sɔ sɪkʰ səbəd̪ ʋəkʰɑɳɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: سو ستگر سو سکھ سبد وکھاݨآ۔

en.bdb: This is the wonder of the past and the future that they (both) loved the truth.
They were beyond all accounts and were honour of the humble ones.

verse.gurmukhi: smsir AMimRq ivKu n Awvx jwixAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਮਸਰਿ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਵਿਖੁ ਨ ਆਵਣ ਜਾਣਿਆ।

en.bdb: For them, the nectar and poison were the same and they had got liberated from the cycle of transmigration

transliteration.english: samasar a(n)mirat vikh na aavan jaaniaa|
transliteration.hindi: समसरि अंमृत विखु न आवण जाणिआ।
transliteration.en: samasar a(n)mirat vikh na aavan jaaniaa|
transliteration.hi: समसरि अंमृत विखु न आवण जाणिआ।
transliteration.ipa: səməsər əŋmɪɹət̪ ʋɪkʰ nə əɑʋəɳ d͡ʒɑɳɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: سمسر اںمرت وکھ ن آوݨ جاݨآ۔

en.bdb: Recorded as the model of special virtues, they are known as the extremely honourable ones.

verse.gurmukhi: gur isKhu gur isKu hoie hYrwixAw ]12]
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖਹੁ ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖੁ ਹੋਇ ਹੈਰਾਣਿਆ ॥੧੨॥

en.bdb: The wonderful fact is that the sikh of the Guru became the Guru.

transliteration.english: gur sikhahu gur sikh hoi hairaaniaa ||12||
transliteration.hindi: गुर सिखहु गुर सिखु होइ हैराणिआ ॥१२॥
transliteration.en: gur sikhahu gur sikh hoi hairaaniaa ||12||
transliteration.hi: गुर सिखहु गुर सिखु होइ हैराणिआ ॥१२॥
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr sɪkʰəh Gʊr sɪkʰ hɔeɪ hærɑɳɪəɑ.1ə2.
transliteration.ur: گُر سکھهُ گُر سکھ هوا هَےراݨآ ۔۔۱۲۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: 13 : gurmuKW dy l`Cn qy DUV dw pRqwp
verse.unicode: ੧੩ : ਗੁਰਮੁਖਾਂ ਦੇ ਲੱਛਨ ਤੇ ਧੂੜ ਦਾ ਪ੍ਰਤਾਪ

en.bdb: Virtues of the gurmukhs and the glory of the dust

transliteration.english: 13 : gurmukhaa(n) dhe la'chhan te dhooR dhaa prataap
transliteration.hindi: १३ : गुरमुखाँ दे लच्छन ते धूड़ दा प्रताप
transliteration.en: 13 : gurmukhaa(n) dhe la'chhan te dhooR dhaa prataap
transliteration.hi: १३ : गुरमुखाँ दे लच्छन ते धूड़ दा प्रताप
transliteration.ipa: 1ə3 : Gʊrəmʊkʰɑⁿ d̪e lɕən t̪e t̪uɽ d̪ɑ pɹət̪ɑp
transliteration.ur: ۱۳ : گُرمکھاں دے لّچھن تے دھُوڑ دا پرتاپ

en.bdb: Gurmukhs drink the unbearable Cup of love filled to the brims and being in the presence of the all;
Pervading Lord they perceive the imperceptible.
The one who resides in all hearts is dwelling in their hearts.
The love creeper of their's has become full of fruits as the seedling of grape turns out to be fruitful vine.
Becoming sandal, they provide coolness to one and all.

verse.gurmukhi: cMdn cMd kpUr n myil imlwvxw[
verse.unicode: ਚੰਦਨ ਚੰਦ ਕਪੂਰ ਨ ਮੇਲਿ ਮਿਲਾਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Their cool is like the coolness of sandal, moon, and camphor.

transliteration.english: cha(n)dhan cha(n)dh kapoor na mel milaavanaa|
transliteration.hindi: चंदन चंद कपूर न मेलि मिलावणा।
transliteration.en: cha(n)dhan cha(n)dh kapoor na mel milaavanaa|
transliteration.hi: चंदन चंद कपूर न मेलि मिलावणा।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃəŋd̪ən t͡ʃəŋd̪ kəpur nə mel mɪlɑʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: چںدن چںد کپُور ن مےل ملاوݨا۔

en.bdb: Associating the sun (rajas) with the moon (sattv) they assuage its heat.

verse.gurmukhi: crx kvl dI DUir msqik lwvxw[
verse.unicode: ਚਰਣ ਕਵਲ ਦੀ ਧੂਰਿ ਮਸਤਕਿ ਲਾਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: They put on their forehead the dust of the lotus feet

transliteration.english: charan kaval dhee dhoor masatak laavanaa|
transliteration.hindi: चरण कवल दी धूरि मसतकि लावणा।
transliteration.en: charan kaval dhee dhoor masatak laavanaa|
transliteration.hi: चरण कवल दी धूरि मसतकि लावणा।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃərəɳ kəʋəl d̪i t̪ur məsət̪ək lɑʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: چرݨ کول دیِ دھُور مستک لاوݨا۔

en.bdb: And come to know the creator as the root cause of all the causes.
When flame (of knowledge) flashes in their heart, the unstruck melody starts ringing.

verse.gurmukhi: 14 : gurmuKW dy l`Cx qy DUV dw pRqwp
verse.unicode: ੧੪ : ਗੁਰਮੁਖਾਂ ਦੇ ਲੱਛਣ ਤੇ ਧੂੜ ਦਾ ਪ੍ਰਤਾਪ

en.bdb: Virtues of the gurmukhs and the glory of the dust

transliteration.english: 14 : gurmukhaa(n) dhe la'chhan te dhooR dhaa prataap
transliteration.hindi: १४ : गुरमुखाँ दे लच्छण ते धूड़ दा प्रताप
transliteration.en: 14 : gurmukhaa(n) dhe la'chhan te dhooR dhaa prataap
transliteration.hi: १४ : गुरमुखाँ दे लच्छण ते धूड़ दा प्रताप
transliteration.ipa: 1ə4 : Gʊrəmʊkʰɑⁿ d̪e lɕəɳ t̪e t̪uɽ d̪ɑ pɹət̪ɑp
transliteration.ur: ۱۴ : گُرمکھاں دے لّچھݨ تے دھُوڑ دا پرتاپ

en.bdb: The power of the one vibration of the Lord transcends all limits.
The wonder and power of Oankft is indescribable.
It is with His support that millions of rivers carrying life water go on flowing.
In His creation, the gurmukhs are known as invaluable diamonds and rubies
And they remain steadfast in gurmati and are accepted with honour in the court of the Lord.
The path of the gurmukhs is straight and clear and they reflect the truth.
Myriad poets desire to know the mystery of His Word.

verse.gurmukhi: crx kvl rj Goil AMimRq vwxIAY[
verse.unicode: ਚਰਣ ਕਵਲ ਰਜ ਘੋਲਿ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਵਾਣੀਐ।

en.bdb: The gurmukhs have quaffed the dust of the feet of Gum like amrit.

transliteration.english: charan kaval raj ghol a(n)mirat vaaneeaai|
transliteration.hindi: चरण कवल रज घोलि अंमृत वाणीऐ।
transliteration.en: charan kaval raj ghol a(n)mirat vaaneeaai|
transliteration.hi: चरण कवल रज घोलि अंमृत वाणीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃərəɳ kəʋəl rəd͡ʒ Gʰɔl əŋmɪɹət̪ ʋɑɳiæ.
transliteration.ur: چرݨ کول رج گھول اںمرت واݨیِاَے۔

en.bdb: This tale is also ineffable.
Waheguru, the wondrous Lord is ineffable

verse.gurmukhi: kwdr no kurbwxu kIm n jwxIAY[
verse.unicode: ਕਾਦਰ ਨੋ ਕੁਰਬਾਣੁ ਕੀਮ ਨ ਜਾਣੀਐ।

en.bdb: I am sacrifice unto that creator whose value cannot be estimated.

transliteration.english: kaadhar no kurabaan keem na jaaneeaai|
transliteration.hindi: कादर नो कुरबाणु कीम न जाणीऐ।
transliteration.en: kaadhar no kurabaan keem na jaaneeaai|
transliteration.hi: कादर नो कुरबाणु कीम न जाणीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: kɑd̪ər nɔ kʊrəbɑɳ kim nə d͡ʒɑɳiæ.
transliteration.ur: کادر نو کُرباݨ کیِم ن جاݨیِاَے۔

en.bdb: How could anybody tell how old is He?
What could I tell about the powers of theLord who enhances the honour of the humble ones.

verse.gurmukhi: lK ijmI Asmwx iqlu n qulwxIAY[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਜਿਮੀ ਅਸਮਾਣ ਤਿਲੁ ਨ ਤੁਲਾਣੀਐ।

en.bdb: Myriads of earths and skies are not equal to an iota of His.

transliteration.english: lakh jimee asamaan til na tulaaneeaai|
transliteration.hindi: लख जिमी असमाण तिलु न तुलाणीऐ।
transliteration.en: lakh jimee asamaan til na tulaaneeaai|
transliteration.hi: लख जिमी असमाण तिलु न तुलाणीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ d͡ʒɪmi əsəmɑɳ t̪ɪl nə t̪ʊlɑɳiæ.
transliteration.ur: لکھ جمیِ اسماݨ تل ن تُلاݨیِاَے۔

en.bdb: Millions of universes are wonderstruck to see His power.
He is king of the kings and His ordinance is obvious.
Millions of oceans subsume in His one drop.
Explanations and elaborations pertaining to Him are incomplete (and fake) because His story is ineffable.
Conduct of the gurmukhs
Gurmukhs know well how to move according to the command, hukam of the Lord.
Gurmukh has ordained that community (panth), who moves in the will of Lord.
Becoming contented and true to faith they gratefully thank the Lord.
Gurmukhs perceive His wondrous sport.
They behave innocently like children and eulogize the primaeval Lord.
They merge their consciousness in the holy congregation and truth do they love.
Identifying the word they get liberated and
Loosing their sense of ego they perceive their inner selves.
Glory of the true Guru
The dynamism of the Guru is unmanifest and unfathomable.

verse.gurmukhi: gihr gMBIr AQwh hwiQ n AwxIAY[
verse.unicode: ਗਹਿਰ ਗੰਭੀਰ ਅਥਾਹ ਹਾਥਿ ਨ ਆਣੀਐ।

en.bdb: It is so deep and sublime that its extent cannot be known.

transliteration.english: gahir ga(n)bheer athaeh haath na aaneeaai|
transliteration.hindi: गहिर गंभीर अथाह हाथि न आणीऐ।
transliteration.en: gahir ga(n)bheer athaeh haath na aaneeaai|
transliteration.hi: गहिर गंभीर अथाह हाथि न आणीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gəhɪr Gəŋɓir ət̪ʰɑh hɑt̪ʰ nə əɑɳiæ.
transliteration.ur: گهِر گںبھیِر اتھاه هاتھ ن آݨیِاَے۔

en.bdb: As from each drop become many tumultuous rivulets,
Likewise the ever-growing glory of gurmukhs becomes ineffable.
His shores near and far cannot be known and He is adorned in infinite ways.
The comings and goings cease after entering the court of the Lord i.e. one becomes liberated from the bondage of  transmigration.
The true Guru is totally carefree yet He is the power of the powerless ones.
Blessed is the true Guru, seeing whom all feel wonderstruck
Holy congregation is the abode of truth
Holy congregation is the abode of truth where gurmukhs go to reside.
Gurmukhs adore the grand and powerful true name (of the Lord).
There skillfully they enhance their inner flame (of knowledge).

verse.gurmukhi: soiD ifTw bRhmMfu lvY n lweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਸੋਧਿ ਡਿਠਾ ਬ੍ਰਹਮੰਡੁ ਲਵੈ ਨ ਲਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: Having seen the whole universe I have found that none reaches His grandeur.

transliteration.english: sodh ddiThaa brahama(n)dd lavai na laieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: सोधि डिठा ब्रहमंडु लवै न लाईऐ।
transliteration.en: sodh ddiThaa brahama(n)dd lavai na laieeaai|
transliteration.hi: सोधि डिठा ब्रहमंडु लवै न लाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: sɔt̪ə̀ ɖɪʈʰɑ bɹəhəməŋɖ ləʋæ nə lɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: سودھ ڈٹھا برهمںڈ لوَے ن لاایاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: iqsu nwhI jm fMfu srix smweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਤਿਸੁ ਨਾਹੀ ਜਮ ਡੰਡੁ ਸਰਣਿ ਸਮਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: He who has come to the shelter of the holy congregation has no longer the fear of death.

transliteration.english: tis naahee jam dda(n)dd saran samaieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: तिसु नाही जम डंडु सरणि समाईऐ।
transliteration.en: tis naahee jam dda(n)dd saran samaieeaai|
transliteration.hi: तिसु नाही जम डंडु सरणि समाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɪs nɑhi d͡ʒəm ɖəŋɖ sərəɳ səmɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: تِس ناهیِ جم ڈںڈ سرݨ سماایاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: Gor pwp kir KMfu nrik n pweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਘੋਰ ਪਾਪ ਕਰਿ ਖੰਡੁ ਨਰਕਿ ਨ ਪਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: Even the horrible sins are decimated and one escapes going to the hell.

transliteration.english: ghor paap kar kha(n)dd narak na paieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: घोर पाप करि खंडु नरकि न पाईऐ।
transliteration.en: ghor paap kar kha(n)dd narak na paieeaai|
transliteration.hi: घोर पाप करि खंडु नरकि न पाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʰɔr pɑp kər kʰəŋɖ nərək nə pɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: گھور پاپ کر کھںڈ نرک ن پاایاَے۔

en.bdb: As the rice comes out of husk, similarly whosoever goes to the holy congregation gets liberated.
There, homogenous truth prevails and falsehood remains far behind.
Conduct of the gursikhs
Bravo to the Sikhs of Gum who have refined their lives.
The right living of the Sikhs of the Guru is that they love the Guru.
Gurumukhs remember the name of the Lord with every breath and every morsel.
Epudiating pride they remain detached amidst maya.
Gurmukhs consider hemselves as the servant of the servants and service only is their true conduct.
Pondering upon the Word, they remain neutral towards hopes.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK shij invwsu mn hT mwirAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਹਜਿ ਨਿਵਾਸੁ ਮਨ ਹਠ ਮਾਰਿਆ।

en.bdb: Eschewing stubbornness of mind, gurmukhs reside in equipoise.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sahaj nivaas man haTh maariaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सहजि निवासु मन हठ मारिआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh sahaj nivaas man haTh maariaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सहजि निवासु मन हठ मारिआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ səhəd͡ʒ nɪʋɑs mən həʈʰ mɑrɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سهج نواس من هٹھ مارآ۔

en.bdb: Enlightened  of gurmukhs salvages many a fallen one.
Conduct of the gurmukhs
Those gurmukhs are acclaimed who have found the true Guru.
Practising the Word, they have emancipated their whole families.
Gurmukhs have the Will of God and they work according to the truth.
Eschewing ego, they obtain the door of liberation.
The gurmukhs have made the mind understand the principle of altruism.
The base of gurmukhs is truth and they (finally) get absorbd into truth.
Gurmukhs are not scared of public opinion
And this way they visualise that imperceptible Lord.
Nature of the gurmukhs
Touching the philosopher's stone in the form of gurmukh all the eight metals transform into gold i.e. all the people become pure.

verse.gurmukhi: Ast Dwqu iek Dwqu pwrsu prsxw[
verse.unicode: ਅਸਟ ਧਾਤੁ ਇਕ ਧਾਤੁ ਪਾਰਸੁ ਪਰਸਣਾ।

en.bdb: Like the fragrance of sandal they permeate all the trees i.e. they adopt one and all as their own.

transliteration.english: asaT dhaat ik dhaat paaras parasanaa|
transliteration.hindi: असट धातु इक धातु पारसु परसणा।
transliteration.en: asaT dhaat ik dhaat paaras parasanaa|
transliteration.hi: असट धातु इक धातु पारसु परसणा।
transliteration.ipa: əsəʈ t̪ɑt̪ eɪk t̪ɑt̪ pɑrəs pərəsəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: اسٹ دھات اک دھات پارس پرسݨا۔

en.bdb: They are like Ganges in which all the rivers and rivulets merge and become full of vitality.
Gurmukhs re the swans of Manasamvar who are not perturbed by other cravings.

verse.gurmukhi: mwn srovr hMs n iqRsnw qrsxw[
verse.unicode: ਮਾਨ ਸਰੋਵਰ ਹੰਸ ਨ ਤ੍ਰਿਸਨਾ ਤਰਸਣਾ।

en.bdb: The Sikhs of the Guru are the paramharisas, the swans of the highest order

transliteration.english: maan sarovar ha(n)s na tirasanaa tarasanaa|
transliteration.hindi: मान सरोवर हंस न तृसना तरसणा।
transliteration.en: maan sarovar ha(n)s na tirasanaa tarasanaa|
transliteration.hi: मान सरोवर हंस न तृसना तरसणा।
transliteration.ipa: mɑn sərɔʋər həŋs nə t̪ɪɹəsənɑ t̪ərəsəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: مان سروور هںس ن ترسنا ترسݨا۔

en.bdb: So do not mix up with ordinary ones and their sight is not easily available.
Craving reposed in the shelter of Guru, even the so called untouchables become honourable.
The company of the holy, forms the regime of Truth everlasing.
